front.title: Generalized Multiprotocol Label Switching (GMPLS) control of Ethernet PBB-TE

abstract.t: This specification is complementary to the GMPLS Ethernet Label Switching Architecture and Framework and describes the technology specific aspects of GMPLS control for Provider Backbone Bridge Traffic Engineering (PBB-TE). The necessary GMPLS extensions and mechanisms are described to establish Ethernet PBB-TE point to point (P2P) and point to multipoint (P2MP) connections. This document supports, but does not modify, the standard IEEE data plane.
